participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, enthusiastic, and passionate about teaching and gaming.
participant_1.background: I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets. My family members are all very supportive of my interests and always encourage me to explore new things. I'm a sixth grade teacher and a professional gamer. I woke up to find my three sisters had decorated my bedroom for my birthday.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nurturing, adventurous, and sporty with a love for animals and gaming.
participant_2.background: I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to. My mother was a piano teacher. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I'm a girl who loves sports cars and video games. I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks for asking!
I love video games, sports cars and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time.
I am a professional gamer, sixth grade teacher and I love my pets.
That's really interesting! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I don't think I could handle the stress.
It can be a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. What grade do you teach?
That's great! I think that's such an important age for kids.
I agree. It's a time when they're really starting to figure out who they are and what they want to do with their lives.
That's a really important job you have. I'm sure you make a big difference in the lives of your students.
Thank you, that means a lot.
